author: bhargav
description:
Description: Python based visualization Tool for PLUTO code data.
Homepage URL: http://www.ast.leeds.ac.uk/~phybva/Bhargav_Vaidya/pyCODES.html
Version: 1.1

This is a GUI written to visualize data obtained from a 3D fluid dynamics code called PLUTO [Mignone 2007]. The GUI is based on Python Tkinter package. For screen shots of GUI visualization toolkit and various features check out the Homepage URL.

Repo @ github : https://github.com/coolastro/pyPLUTO.git
title: pyPLUTO
